Intense records open day - saturday 18th november

Intense Records Open Day feat DJ Friction, IC3 & More - Sat 18th Nov

*****THIS EVENT WILL BE BROADCAST LIVE *****
*****ON PLANETDNB*****

On the 18th November Intense Records will be holding an open day
for all the local djs and music enthusiasts.
A selection of the scenes pioneering djs and mcs have been chosen to grace the decks live at intense
showcasing the huge variety of musical styles catered for in the shop
including Drum & Bass, Breakz, House, Garage & Grime.

We have been lucky to enough to secure DJ Friction, one of the biggest DJs in Drum & Bass
to come down to the shop to sign copies of his new double pack mix cd, entitled 'The Next Level 2'
out now on Frictions own label Shogun Audio.

After the success of last years debut ‘Next Level’ CD, released on Valve Recordings
DJ Friction utilizes his diverse Shogun Audio Empire to once again deliver an outstanding
selection of Drum & Bass music. Spanning two CD’s and covering the full spectrum of the scene
The ‘Next Level 2’ features 48 of the freshest Drum & Bass tracks on the planet.
Featured artists: The Freestylers Ft Pendulum, Dillinja, High Contrast, Krafty Kuts & Tim Deluxe
Calibre, Noisia, Zinc, Makoto & Mc Stamina, Clipz, Teebee & Calyx, DJ Friction & K-Tee, Commix
D-Bridge, Alix Perez, Break ,SP:MC, Logistics, TC, Baron + many more.

CD 1 ‘The Next Level’ replicates a Friction club set, right across the board, light to dark,smooth to hard
everything is represented. 'The Deeper Level’, as showcased on CD 2, heads deep into
the musical realms of Friction’s selection which includes some of the most profound
exclusive and simply musical Drum and Bass tracks around right now.
With a worldwide ‘Next Level 2’ tour to accompany the CD
be sure to catch DJ Friction at a venue near you soon:

So if you would like your copy of Frictions Next Level 2 CD, signed by the man himself
get down to Intense Records 33/34 Viaduct Road, Chelmsford Essex.
If you do not have a copy yet, you will be able to purchase the cd
and get it signed at the open day for a special price of £9.99.

Soundbytes Comp - Win £50 worth of vinyl

To celebrate The new Soundbytes Records Show featuring DJ T-LITE on Planetdnb.com
Those kind people down at Soundbytes are running a competition.

With the prize being £50 worth of vinyl

Which of the following is a popular A.I track

A. Up Rising
B. Down Rising
C. Low Rising

conditions of entry:

You must be a registered forum member.
competition entries must be through PM feature only!!
winner will choose from drum n bass 97-99 & 2000+ only
Prize does not inc postage !!

PM Your Answers To Skudge
Goodluck !!!!

Venom Vs Radical Beats - Boxing Day Party

26th Dec Venom Vs Radical Beats - Boxing Day Party

http://www.planetdnb.com/dnb_news2512.php

Venom returns once again for the 6th Boxing Day special @ Zest Nightclub.

This time teaming up with our Partners in Bass - Radical Beats for East Anglia's BIGGEST allnight xmas party.

Bringing you 3 arenas of musical madness.

ARENA 1, for the first time ever in Ipswich we bring you one of drum n bass's true legends Dillinja and the superstars of 2006 the dynamic duo Chase and Status along side Funky Flirt & Unix from Londons Kool FM. Spittin the lyrical will be the legend that is Mr Fearless with a New Breed special featuring Eksman, Fatman & Shortston along side PlanetDnB's Petite & MRD, Ipswich's finest EQ & Marty and many more.

ARENA 2 Bangers & Mashed Xmas Dinner Party - Hosted by Hardcore Born with Happy Chapz b2b Top Bunkz, Uplift b2b Sc@r, Mixman b2b Magic Motion and many more. MCs El B, Mayers, Dan E & Jutt

ARENA 3 the very best in Old Skool Garage, RnB, Hip Hop & Bashment with the VIP Family. Lexu$, Kante, Jammy, Remedy and guests.

Merchandise stall on the night will be selling CD packs, whistles, horns, glow sticks, hats, clothing, laughing gas balloons and oxygen bar and loads more!!

LIVE POLE DANCERS ON THE NIGHT!! (By Pole Stars & Polesation)

This event is from 10PM - 5AM - OVER 18s EVENT - ID REQUIRED

The club is 2 minutes walk from Ipswich station and trains will be running in the morning.

THIS NIGHT WILL BE OFF THE HOOK - SO ARRIVE EARLY TO AVOID DISAPOINTMENT.

Click HERE to buy tickets to this event online

TICKET HOTLINE: 08700 600 100

FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THIS EVENT PLEASE CALL: 07904 141 363

This event will be broadcast LIVE on PlanetDnB radio - Click here to listen

The Cambridge Christmas Carnival !
FRIDAY 8TH DECEMBER 2006

courtesy of Epidemik

Venom Vs Radical Beats // VENUE CHANGE !!!!

Venom Vs Radical Beats // VENUE CHANGE!! VENUE CHANGE!! VENUE CHANGE!!

:: :: :: NOT AT ZEST, IPSWICH - NOW AT MASS NIGHTCLUB, BRIXTON :: :: ::

Venom returns once again for the 6th Boxing Day special @ Mass Nightclub, Brixton. This time teaming up with our Partners in Bass - Radical Beats for London’s BIGGEST all night Xmas party hosted all
night by MC Fearless!!

We bring you one of drum n bass's true legends Dillinja and the superstars of 2006 the dynamic duo Chase and Status along side Funky Flirt & Unix from Londons Kool FM also DJs Shuffle, Krucial, Dilemma, Jocky and Joe 90 b2b Gusta.

Spittin the lyrical will be the legend that is Mr Fearless with New Breed’s Eksman, Fatman & Shortston along side PlanetDnB's Petite & MRD, EQ & Marty and many more.

Merchandise stall on the night will be selling CD packs, whistles, horns, glow sticks, hats, clothing, laughing gas balloons and oxygen bar and loads more..

This event is from 10pm - 5am

OVER 18s EVENT - ID REQUIRED
10PM – 6AM

£10 tickets available online and on the door
£20 VIP tickets (including free CD pack) available online only

RADICAL BEATS LABEL LAUNCH NITE !!!!!!!!!

FLYER COMING SOON***
Label launch night
April 14th 2007

DJs

Radical Beats are proud to announce their label launch night at the Brixton Mass SW2.

Bringing you a heavyweight line up including GDub, Nightbreed, Drum Addict, Eddy Woo, Unix, Krucial B2B Dilemma, Prophecy and a special DJ set from Mr Fearless!!

Mcs bringing the lyrical will be IC3, Fearless, MRD, Petite, Mekar, DVS MC and Skeez.

With a booming sound system and massive lazer display, our resident dancers, the Epidemik merchandise stall CD packs, whistles, horns, glow sticks, laughing gas and loads more...

Plus free CD giveaways and much much more this night will be off the hook!!

This event is from 10pm - 6am
OVER 18s EVENT - ID REQUIRED
10PM – 6AM

£10 all night
£8 NUS all night

FREE CD PACK TO THE FIRST 10 THROUGH THE DOOR!!!

Tickets available online £10 +bf

www.ticketweb.co.uk - 08700 600 100

www.ravetickets.co.uk

Trippin Out are running coaches from Ipswich, Colchester, Witham, Chelmsford & Romford.

Call 01245 347372 or 07870 422243 for info

For more info on this event call 07904 141363 or email events@radicalbeats.co.uk or check www.planetdnb.com or www.radicalbeats.co.uk

(The RB website is under construction - bear with us)

welcome to the new PlanetDnB Podcast

welcome to the new PlanetDnB Podcast

Featuring Dj Ziloub & the vocal talents of Miss Drop

*** ZILOUB :

Activist of the Jungle and Drum&Bass stage since 1999
Ziloub has been able to develop his own musical touch and sound
He is quite simply fascinated for this musical style.

2001 : He become member of the label Audiovenum
and play in the most important events in Parislike "Massive" at Rex Club
"Frenezik" at Triptyque"Flavor of the Month" at Batofar,at "Nouveau Casino"
and soon at "I Love Jungle" ! with artists such as : Danny Byrd,J Majik,
Elisa Do Brasil, Science, Fx909, Otis, T-Rex, Kolsik, Anakyne
as many others ! He also participates at many shows on webradio
like Mediagong and brings for the first time broadcasts exclusively
drum'n'bass on this webradio. This experience brings him to create
his own independent webradio that came to life in 2005: Beatbreakerz.com
during which he regularly leads live shows with artists he already shared
his passion. 2007 : new musical collaboration with Miss Drop
a french vocalist who has taken part in many tracks with Fx909
Alix Perez, Specific and others to come !

BOOKINGS : ziloub@gmail.com

MYSPACE : http://myspace.com/djziloub

*** MISS DROP :

Miss Drop's passion for D'n'B came around summer 1998.
She knew it was THE sound that would open her life
into the electronic world. In 2000, she moved to Paris to finish her studies
and went to her first free parties in France & first Massive, one of the
biggest jungle parties in Paris In 2003 she met Anakyne (UnderPressure Records)
who had heard her singing and proposed her to sing in some of his mixes.
In 2005 Anakyne was working with LaVibe.org in a monthly project party
and gave her the chance to be the resident vocalist next to OTIS (Under Pressure Recs / Black Label Recs)
FX909 (Touchin' Down / Defunked), ANAKYNE (Under Pressure Recs / New Hope Recs)
MC DIGICLA (until january 2006) and then alongside of RASLION MC from Hotstepper Crew.
It was at this moment that she met FX909.She accepted to work on some of his tunes.

Since her debut, Miss DROP has already worked in collaboration with many d'n'b dj's and producers.
FX909 & MISS DROP have now a forthcoming on SOLE Recordings.

[-FX909 + MISS DROP - Roads of sorrow - (SOLE recordings) – UK]

*SOLéRecordings(c) (UK) forthcoming:*
*FX909 + MISS DROP "Roads of sorrow"

http://www.lavibe.org/viewtopic.php?t=9002

*BOOKINGS:* *
purpledrop@gmail.com

*MYSPACE:*
www.myspace.com/missdrop

------------------------------------------------------
